name: 10x East
slogan: Connecting West to the East Through Press, Partnerships, Consulting & Access to Investors
description:
Connecting East to the West

Europe's No.1 PR & Media Company Focused On Asian Markets


➤ Press Release

We help you get published on +560 Worldwide Media Portals from Forbes, to Tencent News, From NY Times, Yahoo Finance, Google News, Marketwatch to QQ news, Asahi, Yahoo Singapore.

"Think local, Go global"



➤ Business Growth & Partnerships

We Study your business, analyze your target market, help you expand & make strategic decisions.

"You Don't Build A Business, You Build A Network That Becomes Your Net Worth"



➤ Access To Investors

Looking for Funding?

We provide you access to China, HK, UAE, Saudi, European and US Angel Investors & VC funds. We can also personally recommend you to them.

"It doesn't matter what you know if you can't communicate with the right people"



➤ We Value Your Time:

Too busy to go to Conferences?
We can go there representing you.
To save your time ,we also provide Monthly Social Media Managers, Partnerships Management, Lead Generation , Monthly Promotions etc..

"Let's get your Business to the Next Level"


➤ Start Up Booster:

Not sure if your idea is good enough? Can't find investors?
Can't find customers?

We have been there, we know how stressful it can be.

Let us help you to bootstrap your business. Let's define who you are, what you sell, to whom, how & when. Let's get you partnerships, traffic, customers, right branding & the right exposure.

"It's not about ideas, it's about making ideas happen"


Are you ready?

➡ Visit Now www.10xeast.com
➡ Connect with us on Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vilmamattila/
marketTags: Target Market: South Asians Community Worldwide B2 B   51 Mm+

team.name: Vilma Mattila
team.bioHtml: Founder of 10xEast I Business Development |  Growth Hacking I Access to Investors I Blockchain | Asian Markets

jobs.title: High Ticket Closer
jobs.description:
We are looking for **Closers** for European Leading Media & PR Agency.


Niches:
➤Press Releases
➤Start Up Incubating
➤Business Development
➤Blockchain
➤Social Media Marketing 



**+20% COMISSION** of Every Deal Closed



‣  Generate Fresh Leads
‣  Close deals



➤3 deals per week

LinkedIn recommendation + Social Media Mentioning



➤ <10 Deals a month

Free press release of YOU in Market Watch/Google News or Digital Journal



➤ <26 deals in Two months

Mentioning of you in **Forbes**




If you retain with us +3 months with stable incoming deals, We will Increase your comission + Give you access to Higher Priced Deals.



Average deal size 2k-12k $.


➤ 100% Remote
➤ Part-time
➤ Flexible working schedule
➤ Ideal for Digital Nomads


If you are interested, Please Message Me Now.

NOTE: This is Comission Based Role
